Ultimatehostings is a fully managed VPS provider. We have our in-house support team to cover 24x7 support via helpdesk. We utilize only server-grade hardware, our node specs are 8 x E5-1620 @ 3.60GHz, 64GB DDR3 RAM, RAID 1 Disk space.

Datacenter : OVH

Location : Montreal, Canada

AUP : We do not allow IRC, P2p, Warez, spamming, or anything illegal

IPV6 : We offer 10 or more free IPV6 IP addresses on each VPS upon request.
